name: marengo
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of chicken or veal) fried in oil and eaten with a sauce made of tomatoes, mushrooms, garlic, and wine: I served up my chicken marengo for supper that night. This is the original Chicken Marengo recipe, just as it was served to Napoleon! Veal marengo stew is usually served with rice or noodles.
More examplesFewer examplesChicken marengo is a hearty dish, full of mushrooms, tomatoes, garlic and white wine.For a tangy and tasty chicken dish you can always count on a chicken Marengo.
